results.title: My Dreaming
results.brief_description: If you don’t know where you come from how do you know how to go forward? Look into the past, at women who have gone. Have their stories also gone with them?
results.description: If you don’t know where you come from how do you know how to go forward? Look into the past, at women who have gone. Have their stories also gone with them?
description_for_label: If you don’t know where you come from how do you know how to go forward? Look into the past, at women who have gone. Have their stories also gone with them?

holdings.name: MPEG-4 Digital File; ACMI Digital Access Copy - overscan

results.title: The Brown dressing gown
results.brief_description: Patric fondly remembers his social worker Julie Wilson who helped him come out of his cocoon and discard his brown dressing gown. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Department of Human Services and The Deafness Foundation.
results.description: Patric fondly remembers his social worker Julie Wilson who helped him come out of his cocoon and discard his brown dressing gown. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Department of Human Services and The Deafness Foundation.

results.title: Living Hawthorn
results.creator_credit: Johnson and Gibson, William Alfred Gibson and Millard Johnson
results.brief_description: Shows a variety of street scenes in Hawthorn, Victoria, in the early 20th century including shots of Burwood Road, Glenferrie Station, local shops and businesses, traders and residents. Of historical and heritage value. Cinematography by Millard Johnson.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Johnson and Gibson, William Alfred Gibson and Millard Johnson
results.description: Shows a variety of street scenes in Hawthorn, Victoria, in the early 20th century including shots of Burwood Road, Glenferrie Station, local shops and businesses, traders and residents. Of historical and heritage value. Cinematography by Millard Johnson.

results.title: Play Safe
results.creator_credit: Australian Road Safety Council, Video Films and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: Aimed at children, this film highlights a number of road safety aspects. Don Bradman talks to the children about avoiding accidents, both going and coming from school, and during playtime on the school playground.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Australian Road Safety Council, Video Films and Australian National Film Board

results.title: The Muncher  for ZX Spectrum 128
results.creator_credit: Rob Howard, Beam Software, Gremlin Graphics Software and Zero Wait
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover, badge and manual in a plastic cassette case.
results.brief_description: The Muncher [computer game]. The Muncher is a single player side scrolling action game. Players control a rampaging monster destroying buildings by climbing on them, breathing fire and jumping on people and cars while attempting to avoid getting shot at by people with guns. The game ends when the monster’s health has been depleted by being attacked.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rob Howard, Beam Software, Gremlin Graphics Software and Zero Wait
results.description: The Muncher [computer game]. The Muncher is a single player side scrolling action game. Players control a rampaging monster destroying buildings by climbing on them, breathing fire and jumping on people and cars while attempting to avoid getting shot at by people with guns. The game ends when the monster’s health has been depleted by being attacked.
description_for_label: The Muncher [computer game]. The Muncher is a single player side scrolling action game. Players control a rampaging monster destroying buildings by climbing on them, breathing fire and jumping on people and cars while attempting to avoid getting shot at by people with guns. The game ends when the monster’s health has been depleted by being attacked.

results.title: Fist II - The Legend Continues  for Spectrum 48/128
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover and paper insert in a plastic cassette case
results.brief_description: Fist II - The Legend Continues [computer game]. Fist II is a single player side scrolling beat ‘em up with adventure elements. Players travel through different environments, fighting various enemies, collecting items and visiting temples to power up the character to be strong enough to defeat the warlord and free the land.
results.title_for_label: Fist II - The Legend Continues for Spectrum 48/128
results.description: Fist II - The Legend Continues [computer game]. Fist II is a single player side scrolling beat ‘em up with adventure elements. Players travel through different environments, fighting various enemies, collecting items and visiting temples to power up the character to be strong enough to defeat the warlord and free the land.
description_for_label: Fist II - The Legend Continues [computer game]. Fist II is a single player side scrolling beat ‘em up with adventure elements. Players travel through different environments, fighting various enemies, collecting items and visiting temples to power up the character to be strong enough to defeat the warlord and free the land.

results.title: Fighting Warrior  for Spectrum 48K
results.creator_credit: Stephen Cargill, Melbourne House and Studio B
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette and cover in a plastic cassette case.
results.brief_description: Fighting Warrior [computer game]. Fighting Warrior is a single player side scrolling fighting game. Players have a high, mid and low attack, jump, duck and step back and must fight oncoming enemies in one on one combat.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Cargill, Melbourne House and Studio B
